Forbidden
- Operating a vehicle: 24h
- Touching the nasal canal(!)

Avoid:
-Flying: 1-2 weeks
 -Physical activity: 1 week
-Going to sauna: 1 week
-Blowing nose with extreme force: 1 week 

Symptoms:
Normal :
- Stuffed nasal canals ( use nasal spray or other liquids)

Alarming symptoms
-Strong bleeding
-Fever over 38°C
-Strong pain
Secretion of foul smelling mucus
 Visible swelling of the nose :
-> -> IMMEDIATELY contact the treating medical personnel!

Treatment
- Regular anti-inflammatory painkillers
- Nasal drops or sprays can be used during the first nights but nor regularly
- Use of nasal jug, multiple times a day: 1-2 weeks
